Package org.apache.cocoon.generation

Class Summary
CalendarGenerator Generates an XML document representing a calendar for a given month and year.
CSVGenerator A simple parser converting a Comma Separated Values (CSV) file into XML.
CSVGeneratorBean A simple parser converting a Comma Separated Values (CSV) file into XML.
DirectoryGenerator Generates an XML directory listing.
DirectoryGenerator.DirValidity Specific validity class, that holds all files that have been generated
ExceptionGenerator A generator that dumps an XML representation of the exception raised during pipeline execution.
FileGenerator The FileGenerator is a class that reads XML from a source and generates SAX Events.
FileGeneratorBean The FileGenerator is a class that reads XML from a source and generates SAX Events.
FragmentExtractorGenerator  
ImageDirectoryGenerator Generates an XML directory listing.
LinkStatusGenerator Generates a list of links that are reachable from the src and their status.
MP3DirectoryGenerator An extension of DirectoryGenerator that adds extra attributes for MP3 files.
RequestGenerator Generates an XML representation of the incoming request.
SessionAttributeGenerator Generates a document from a session attribute.
TraversableGenerator Generates an XML source hierarchy listing from a Traversable Source.
XPathDirectoryGenerator Generates an XML directory listing performing XPath queries on XML files.
XPathTraversableGenerator Generates an XML collection listing performing XPath queries on XML sources.
 

Exception Summary
RequestParseException
